questions.text: Does the school or department you were admitted to not provide the specialization of the sport in which you have achieved distinction?
Is the department you were admitted to geographically far from the location where you carry out your athletic training?
Have you achieved outstanding athletic distinction in the Olympic Games, World, or European Championships?
Are you an active athlete without interruption of your athletic activity up to the date of your application?
Please indicate the documents that support your case:

possible_answers.text: I can confirm that there is an official confirmation of my studies in the department I was admitted to.
I can confirm that the department I was admitted to does not provide the specialization of the sport in which I have distinction.
I can confirm that there is information from the nearest educational institution regarding the sport specialization in which I have distinction.
I can confirm that the athletic federation has recognized my distinction and active athlete status.

questions.text: The process is complete. Your application has been evaluated.
